Plaintiffs' Motion for Consolidation, Appointment as Lead Plaintiff and Approval of Lead Plaintiffs Selection of Lead Counsel (filed 02/25/08) is granted. Court signs the order.An amended stipulation and scheduling proposed order shall be submitted by not later than March 28, 2008. IT IS SO ORDERED.Court Reporter: Wil Wilcox. ORDER by Judge George H Wu, re The Motion is GRANTED;2. The related Actions are hereby consolidated pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P.42(a); 3. The Court, having considered the provisions of ยง21D(a)(3)(B) of theSecurities Exchange Act of 1934, 15 U.S.C. ยง78u-4(a)(3)(B), as amended by thePrivate Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, appoints Karl Thornbrugh as Lead Plaintiff; and 4. Lead Plaintiffs selection of Lead Counsel is approved. Pursuant toยง21D(a)(3)(B)(v), Coughlin Stoia Geller Rudman & Robbins LLP is approved asLead Counsel for the class.IT IS SO ORDERED. 9 (pj) (Entered: 03/27/2008)

ORDER by Judge George H Wu,Lead plaintiff shall no later than April 23, 2008, file and serve a Consolidated Complaint which shall be the operative complaint in the consolidated action and which shall supersede any other complaints filed in and/or transferred to this Court; Defendants shall no later than May 23, 2008, file an answer or move to dismiss the Consolidated Complaint; 3. If defendants move to dismiss the Consolidated Complaint, leadplaintiffs opposition papers shall be filed and served no later than June 23, 2008; 4. Defendants reply papers shall be filed and served no later than July 23,2008;5. A hearing on defendants motion to dismiss the Consolidated Complaintshall be held on August 4, 2008 or as soon as practicable under the Courts sched (pj) (Entered: 04/04/2008)

ORDER by Judge George H Wu, re Stipulation to Amend/Correct 43 The courts hearing on defendants motion to dismiss which is currently scheduled for August 21, 2008, is hereby taken off calendar without prejudice to defendants subsequent re-noticing of the motion should Lead Plaintiff not file an Amended Consolidated Complaint; Lead Plaintiff shall file and serve an Amended Consolidated Complaintwithin 45 days from the date of the entry of this Order1; Defendants shall answer, move or otherwise respond to the AmendedConsolidated Complaint 30 days after service of the Amended ConsolidatedComplaint; If any defendant moves to dismiss the Amended Consolidated Complaint,Lead Plaintiff shall file its opposition to such motion 30 days after service; Defendants shall file their reply in support of their motion to dismiss 30days after service of Lead Plaintiffs opposition to defendants motion to dismiss. (pj) (Entered: 08/26/2008)

NOTICE OF LODGING filed re MOTION for Settlement Approval of Final Approval of Class Action Settlement and Plan of Allocation of Settlement Proceeds MOTION for Attorney Fees and Expenses 75 (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order Final Judgment and Order of Dismissal with Prejudice, # 2 Proposed Order Approving Plan of Allocation of Settlement Proceeds, # 3 Proposed Order Awarding Lead Counsel's Attorneys' Fees and Expenses)(Bull, Joy) (Entered: 11/11/2009)

ORDER by Judge George H Wu Approving Plan of Allocation of Settlement Proceeds: For purposes of this Order, the terms used herein shall have the same meanings as set forth in the Stipulation of Settlement dated 3/12/09. The Court hereby finds and concludes that the Plan of Allocation set forth in the Notice is in all respects fair and reasonable and the Court hereby approves the Plan of Allocation. Re: 75 Motion for Settlement; Motion for Attorney Fees. (mg) (Entered: 11/16/2009)

ORDER by Judge George H Wu Awarding Lead Counsel's Attorney Fees and Expenses 75 . The Court hereby awards Lead Counsel attorneys' fees of 23.5% of the Settlement Fund, plus reimbursement of litigation expenses in the amount of $325,000 together with the interest earned thereon for the same time period and at the same rate as that earned on the Settlement Fund until paid. Pursuant to 15 U.S.C. ยง78u-4(a)(4), Lead Plaintiff Karl Thornbrugh is hereby awarded $4,200.00 in costs. (mg) (Entered: 11/16/2009)

FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER of Dismissal With Prejudice by Judge George H Wu: This Judgment incorporates by reference the definitions in the Stipulation and all terms used herein shall have the same meanings set forth in the Stipulation 65 . (MD JS-6, Case Terminated). (mg) (Entered: 11/16/2009)
